Work

Weather Dashboard

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,jQuery,Bootstrap

Its a third party API that calls on OPenWeather to give information about any particular city its temperature, humidty and UV index. The UV index is color coded with green being favorable, orange being moderate and red being severe. It also gives a five(5) day forecast for that particular city

View Project on GitHub

Work Day Schedule

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,jQuery,Bootstrap

A web -site that creates a normal 9-6 work schedule. Each time block has areas where imformation can be entered and its color coded for present, past and future.

View Project on GitHub

Timed Quiz

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,jQuery,Bootstrap

It creates a timed quiz if a question is answered incorrectly ten(10) seconds is deducted from the score. It records your score and tallies all high scores

View Project on GitHub

Task Master

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,jQuery,Bootstrap

Is a task planner where you can add task rearrange in terms on in progress to do or completed.The task can be added or deleted

Bored

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS

Its a group project using API to generate planned or random activities using Bored API and geo-locate your location to call on weather API to give your current weather
